put.summary: Game confirmation, the casino can approve a game from this service. Then the game will be scheduled.
Game decline, the casino can decline a game from this service. Then the game will be won't be schedule anymore.

get.summary: Defines if the game is sendable.

400.description:
ERR_GAME_005 - Workflow error.
ERR_GAME_022 - The game is a casino game, we can not send it.

post.summary: Game join action for a user.

get.summary: Get the entire members of a game. Members are confirmed users, or players on the waiting list, sorted by confirmed date.
Get the playing members of a game. This list is just determining the confirmed players actually selected.
Get the playing members of a game. This list is just determining the confirmed players actually selected.
Get the playing members of a game. Not Implemented Yet
Define if the user is member of the game, and return the full entity.

post.summary: Game quit action for a user.

put.summary: Send the request for the game to the casino.

400.description:
ERR_GAME_005 - Workflow error.
ERR_GAME_021 - The game cannot be sent because it is not in the good state.
ERR_GAME_022 - The game is a casino game, we can not send it.
